Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to multi-service health clubs
Summary: Exempts multi-service health clubs from the provisions stating that no contract for services shall require payment by the person receiving service or the use of the facilities in a total amount of three thousand six hundred dollars per annum.
LawCode: Amd ยง623, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to multi-service health clubs
